metadata.title: CVE-2017-1000015 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
phpMyAdmin 4.0, 4.4, and 4.6 are vulnerable to a CSS injection attack through crafted cookie parameters

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-1000015` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

phpmyadmin - 4:4.6.6-5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4:4.6.6-5').
